gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Jazz 134, Hornets 122
gameRecap.excerpt: The Jazz defeated the Hornets, 134-122. Lauri Markkanen recorded 33 points (7-12 3pt. FG) and 12 rebounds for the Jazz, while Collin Sexton added 24 points and a career-high 13 assists in the victory. P.J. Washington tallied a career-high tying 43 points (7-9 3pt. FG) for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Jazz improve to 24-23 on the season, while the Hornets fall to 10-34.
